subject: Paralympic Games
Traffic Accidents and Safety
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Alex Zanardi, a former IndyCar racer who lost his legs in a crash in Germany in 2001, won two handcycling gold medals at the Paralympic Games, which ended Sunday.
snippet: Alex Zanardi, a former IndyCar racer who lost his legs in a crash in Germany in 2001, won two handcycling gold medals at the Paralympic Games, which ended Sunday.
